title: Extent of change - role of gov. in Progressive Era

content.question:
Directions: You are advised to spend 5 minutes planning and 30 minutes writing your answer. Cite relevant historical evidence in support of your generalizations and present your arguments clearly and logically.

To what extent did the role of the federal government change under President Theodore Roosevelt in regard to TWO of the following.

Labor

Trusts

Conservation

World affairs

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
